blog.name: crtranscript
blog.title: Critical Role Transcript
blog.description: A #Critter project to add captions to every episode of Critical Role.

summary: MATT: You’re taking damage, fool. That is 18 points of slashing damage against you. TRAVIS: I have a half damage to all...
body:
MATT: You’re taking damage, fool. That is 18 points of slashing damage against you.

TRAVIS: I have a half damage to all bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage?

MATT: You haven’t raged yet.

TRAVIS: So I’m not raging?!

MATT: You haven’t raged yet! It isn’t your turn yet.

TRAVIS: But I’m so angry.

MATT: I know. You’re about to be so angry.

reblog.comment:
MATT: You’re taking damage, fool. That is 18 points of slashing damage against you.

TRAVIS: I have a half damage to all bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage?

MATT: You haven’t raged yet.

TRAVIS: So I’m not raging?!

MATT: You haven’t raged yet! It isn’t your turn yet.

TRAVIS: But I’m so angry.

MATT: I know. You’re about to be so angry.

trail.content_raw:
MATT: You’re taking damage, fool. That is 18 points of slashing damage against you.

TRAVIS: I have a half damage to all bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage?

MATT: You haven’t raged yet.

TRAVIS: So I’m not raging?!

MATT: You haven’t raged yet! It isn’t your turn yet.

TRAVIS: But I’m so angry.

MATT: I know. You’re about to be so angry.
trail.content:
MATT: You’re taking damage, fool. That is 18 points of slashing damage against you.

TRAVIS: I have a half damage to all bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage?

MATT: You haven’t raged yet.

TRAVIS: So I’m not raging?!

MATT: You haven’t raged yet! It isn’t your turn yet.

TRAVIS: But I’m so angry.

MATT: I know. You’re about to be so angry.

summary: Travis:  Yeah, I like to cause a little chaos.  For fun, you know?  Like to poke the sleeping bear every now and then.  Chris...
body:
Travis:  Yeah, I like to cause a little chaos.  For fun, you know?  Like to poke the sleeping bear every now and then.

Chris Perkins:  Yeah, let me show you how it’s done, motherfucker.  *throws wasps at two fire giants*

reblog.comment:
Travis:  Yeah, I like to cause a little chaos.  For fun, you know?  Like to poke the sleeping bear every now and then.

Chris Perkins:  Yeah, let me show you how it’s done, motherfucker.  *throws wasps at two fire giants*

Chris Perkins:  Yeah, let me show you how it’s done, motherfucker.  *throws wasps at two fire giants*

summary: I haven’t watched this episode of Talks since it aired but I wanted to share with you all this clip of what has stuck with me...
caption:
I haven’t watched this episode of Talks since it aired but I wanted to share with you all this clip of what has stuck with me since, especially Brian’s sentiment at the end

(Contains discussion of Mollymauk’s character, Taliesin’s fav part of playing Molly, Brian telling Taliesin that his characters make an impact, and Matt saying he wants Taliesin in every game he plays)

Edit: Had to remove it from my youtube and tumblr has a size limit so the video quality is not as good as before, sorry!

summary:
Me: *Trying to fall asleep* 
My brain: Imagine if Veth was pregnant, but not far along to be noticed and they drowned her. What...
body:
Me: *Trying to fall asleep*

My brain: Imagine if Veth was pregnant, but not far along to be noticed and they drowned her. What if Veth know, what if the curse didn’t work on the baby she was carrying. What if it’s to painful for her to think about.

Me: SHUT UP! Sam wouldn’t do that to us.

My brain: Or would he

Me: Goddamit! SHUT IT! I need sleep!

reblog.comment:

My brain: Or would he

Me: Goddamit! SHUT IT! I need sleep!

My brain: Or would he

Me: Goddamit! SHUT IT! I need sleep!
trail.content:

My brain: Imagine if Veth was pregnant, but not far along to be noticed and they drowned her. What if Veth know, what if the curse didn’t work on the baby she was carrying. What if it’s to painful for her to think about.

Me: SHUT UP! Sam wouldn’t do that to us.

My brain: Or would he

Me: Goddamit! SHUT IT! I need sleep!
